SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.javact.lang
Class Controler

java.lang.Object
  org.javact.lang.Controler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class Controler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

The controler of an actor. It contains the links to the (delegate) components. It's used as a connector. Middleware-level only.

Version:
0.5.0
Author:
SL
See Also:
Serialized Form

          Builds an actor by linking all its next components to the controler.

Constructor Detail

Controler

public Controler(QuasiBehavior beh,
                 MailBoxCtI box,
                 BecomeCtI bec,
                 CreateCtI crt,
                 LifeCycleCtI lif,
                 MoveCtI mve,
                 SendCtI snd,
                 Agent a)
Builds an actor by linking all its components to the controler, and starts its life cycle.

Parameters:
beh - the behavior
box - the MailBox component
bec - the Become component
crt - the Create component
lif - the LifeCycle component
mve - the Move component
snd - the Send component
a - the Receive component - the true reference of the actor

Controler

public Controler(QuasiBehavior nbeh,
                 MailBoxCtI nbox,
                 BecomeCtI nbec,
                 CreateCtI ncrt,
                 LifeCycleCtI nlif,
                 MoveCtI nmve,
                 SendCtI nsnd,
                 java.util.Vector mq)
Builds an actor by linking all its next components to the controler. Used in the mobility mechanism (MoveCt). After that the method changeToNextForceReInit() is invoked.

Parameters:
nbeh - the next behavior
nbox - the next MailBox component
nbec - the next Become component
ncrt - the next Create component
nlif - the next LifeCycle component
nmve - the next Move component
nsnd - the next Send component
mq - the mail queue with the messages not read
Method Detail

changeToNext

public void changeToNext()
Used by the life cycle to change the update the components. Triggers mobility if needed.

changeToNextForceReInit

public void changeToNextForceReInit(Agent a)
After mobility, this method updates controler's references in components, invokes changeToNext(), and re-starts the life cycle.

Parameters:
a - the reference of the actor, its receive component

send

public void send(Message m,
                 Agent a)
Sends a message m to awith the send component.

Parameters:
m - the message (JAM) to send
a - the receiver

send

public void send(MessageWithReply m,
                 Agent a)
Sends a message m to awith the send component.

Parameters:
m - the message (JSM) to send
a - the receiver

getMessage

protected Message getMessage()
To get a message from the mailbox. This method blocks and wait until a message can be proceeded.

Should be used only by the LifeCycleCt

Returns:
a message from the mailbox

receive

public void receive(Message m)
This method is called when the actor receives a message. If so, the waiting thread (if it exists) is notified.

Parameters:
m - the received message

become

public void become(QuasiBehavior b)
To change the behavior (for the next message).

Parameters:
b - behavior

suicide

public void suicide()
To kill itself

public Actor create(QuasiBehavior b)
Creates an actor from a behavior.

Parameters:
b - the future behavior
Returns:
the reference of the new actor

create

public Actor create(java.lang.String p,
                    QuasiBehavior b)
Creates an actor on a given place from a behavior.

Parameters:
p - the place where the actor will be created
b - behavior
Returns:
the reference of the new actor

create

public Actor create(java.lang.String p,
                    QuasiBehavior b,
                    MailBoxCtI box,
                    BecomeCtI bec,
                    CreateCtI crt,
                    LifeCycleCtI lif,
                    MoveCtI mve,
                    SendCtI snd)
Creates an actor on a given place with the specified components.

Parameters:
p - place where the actor will be created
b - behavior
box - the MailBox component
bec - the Become component
crt - the Create component
lif - the LifeCycle component
mve - the Move component
snd - the Send component
Returns:
the reference of the new actor

create

public Actor create(java.lang.String p,
                    Controler c)
Actor creation from a controler, on a given place. The behavior is included in the controler. Middleware-level only.

Parameters:
p - the place where the actor will be created
c - the controler
Returns:
the reference of the new actor

go

public void go(java.lang.String p)
To set the next place of the actor (for the next message).

Parameters:
p - the place where the actor will go

go

public void go(java.lang.String p,
               HookInterface h)
To set the next place of the actor (for the next message). Warning ! This methods never fails, the code beyond it will ever be executed. The mobility is done when the execution of the behavior is terminated, and the hook is called at this moment if an error occurs

Parameters:
p - the place where the actor will go
h - method resume() of the hook is called if if the mobility process fails

with

public void with(MailBoxCtI box)
User level adaptation of the mailbox component

Parameters:
box - the mailbox component used with the next message

setMyMailBoxCt

public void setMyMailBoxCt(MailBoxCtI mail)
This method is called when the actor receives a message. If so, the waiting thread (if it exists) is notified. When changing the mailbox, the waiting thread -inside getMessage()- (if it exists) is notified, because the isEmpty() semantic could have changed

Parameters:
mail - the new MailBox component

setMyMoveCt

public void setMyMoveCt(MoveCtI mve)
Parameters:
mve - the new Move component

public void setMySendCt(SendCtI snd)

snd - the new Send component
